subtitle: Add improved skeleton jockeys to your world!
description:
This pack adds unique skeleton skins for when the skeleton is riding on either the spider or the skeleton horse!

Limitations:

The skeletons will lose their unique textures if the entity they are riding gets killed and they get reloaded, either through a pack reload, world reload, or chunk reload.
optifine: OptiFine is required so that entity models can be customised.
